law.catch_line: The Commissioner shall adopt regulations reasonably required to carry out this subtitle....

section.section: The Commissioner shall adopt regulations reasonably required to carry out this subtitle.
The regulations may include exemptions for minimum number of hours worked or workers employed.
Payroll records shall be kept in accordance with those regulations.

text.section:
On or before January 1 of each year, the Commissioner shall submit to the Governor and to the Secretary of Labor, Licensing, and Regulation an annual report that:
describes the activities of the Commissioner under this subtitle during the preceding calendar year; and
includes:
each recommendation received from the Advisory Council on Prevailing Wage Rates during the preceding calendar year;
full information about the operation of this subtitle; and
other information about prevailing wage rates, as the Commissioner desires.
